name: HYPREME
description:
:UPPGRAYED: new content! more stuff! controller support! sounds!

Downloading is better than browser cause features.

This is a prototype advergame made at TOJam 2016. We will be updating it a bit from here, but we wanted to show some stuff off!

SEIZURE WARNING: Has a lot of aggressive flashing lights. Play at your own risk.


CONTROLS:

Click to attack

WASD to move

Right click to dodge

Space to buy stuff and pickup stuff and advance menus and stuff.









BUY HYPREME
